panels.description:
How often does a team successfully release its system:

- Elite: on demand (multiple deployments per day)
- High performers: between once per day and once per week
- Medium performers: between once per week and once per month
- Low performers: between once per month and once every six months
panels.title: Average $build_types count per $group_by

panels.description:
The amount of time it takes a commit to get into production:

- Elite performers: less than one day
- High performers: between one day and one week
- Medium performers: between one week and one month
- Low performers: between one month and six months
panels.title: Average Commit Delivery Lead Time

panels.description:
The percentage of deployments causing a failure:

- Elite performers: 0-15%
- High performers: 0-15%
- Medium performers: 0-15%
- Low performers: 40-60%
panels.title: Average $build_types Failure Rate

panels.description:
How long it takes to recover from a failure:

- Elite performers: Less than an hour
- High performers: Less than one day
- Medium performers: Less than one day
- Low performers: Between one week and one month
panels.title: Average $build_types MTTR

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  $__timeGroupAlias(build_date, $group_by), 
  SUM(normalized.succeeded) as "Succeeded",
  SUM(normalized.failed) as "Failed",
  AVG(SUM(normalized.succeeded)) OVER (ROWS 3 PRECEDING) AS "Succeeded Builds Frequency Trend"
FROM(
  SELECT
    triggered_at::date as build_date,
    SUM(CASE WHEN build_is_succeeded THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS succeeded,
    SUM(CASE WHEN build_is_succeeded THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) AS failed
  FROM build_run
  WHERE (COALESCE($project) IS NULL OR project_key IN ($project))
    AND (COALESCE($repository_group) IS NULL OR repository_group IN ($repository_group))
    AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR repository_name IN ($repository_name))
    AND (COALESCE($build_types) IS NULL OR (is_feature_branch_build AND 'Feature branch' IN ($build_types)) OR (is_integration_build AND 'Integration' IN ($build_types)) OR (is_deployment_build AND 'Deployment' IN ($build_types)))
  GROUP BY 1
  ORDER BY build_date
) AS normalized
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(build_date, $group_by, 0)

SELECT time, 
       "Commit delivery lead time",
       AVG ("Commit delivery lead time") OVER (ROWS $points_to_average PRECEDING) AS "Delivery Lead Time Trend"
FROM(
  SELECT
    $__timeGroupAlias(build_run.completed_at, $group_by),
    AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (build_run.completed_at-build_commit.commit_date))/60) AS "Commit delivery lead time"
  FROM build_commit
  INNER JOIN build_run on build_commit.build_run_id = build_run.build_run_id
  WHERE (is_deployment_build OR is_lead_time_calculation_build)
    AND build_is_succeeded
    AND (COALESCE($project) IS NULL OR project_key IN ($project))   
    AND (COALESCE($repository_group) IS NULL OR repository_group IN ($repository_group))
    AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR repository_name IN ($repository_name))
    AND (COALESCE($build_types) IS NULL OR (is_feature_branch_build AND 'Feature branch' IN ($build_types)) OR (is_integration_build AND 'Integration' IN ($build_types)) OR (is_deployment_build AND 'Deployment' IN ($build_types)))
  GROUP BY 1
  ORDER BY $__timeGroup(completed_at, $group_by, NULL)
) AS normalized

panels.title: Commit Delivery Lead Time by $group_by (the less - the better)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT time, "Failure rate",
       AVG ("Failure rate") OVER (ROWS $points_to_average PRECEDING) AS "Failure Rate Trend"
FROM (
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(triggered_at, $group_by),
  SUM(CASE WHEN build_is_succeeded THEN 0 ELSE 1 END)*100/COUNT(*) AS "Failure rate"
FROM build_run
WHERE (COALESCE($project) IS NULL OR project_key IN ($project))   
  AND (COALESCE($repository_group) IS NULL OR repository_group IN ($repository_group))
  AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR repository_name IN ($repository_name))
  AND (COALESCE($build_types) IS NULL OR (is_feature_branch_build AND 'Feature branch' IN ($build_types)) OR (is_integration_build AND 'Integration' IN ($build_types)) OR (is_deployment_build AND 'Deployment' IN ($build_types)))
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(triggered_at, $group_by, NULL)) AS normalized

panels.title: $build_types builds Failure Rate by $group_by (the less - the better)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT time, "Time to recover",
       AVG ("Time to recover") OVER (ROWS $points_to_average PRECEDING) AS "Time To Recover Trend"
FROM(
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(recovered_at, $group_by),
  AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM(recovered_at-first_failed_at))/60) AS "Time to recover"
FROM (
SELECT project_key, repository_name, repository_group, branch_name, MIN(failed_build_number) as first_failure_number, MIN(failed_at) AS first_failed_at, recovered_at
FROM (SELECT failed.project_key,
             failed.repository_name,
             failed.repository_group,
             failed.branch_name,
             failed.build_number AS failed_build_number,
             failed.triggered_at AS failed_at,
             MIN(succeeded.triggered_at) AS recovered_at
        FROM build_run AS failed
        INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM build_run WHERE build_is_succeeded) as succeeded
                ON succeeded.project_key = failed.project_key
                AND succeeded.repository_name = failed.repository_name
                AND succeeded.repository_group = failed.repository_group
                AND succeeded.branch_name = failed.branch_name
                AND succeeded.triggered_at > failed.triggered_at
        WHERE (COALESCE($project) IS NULL OR failed.project_key IN ($project))   
          AND (COALESCE($repository_group) IS NULL OR failed.repository_group IN ($repository_group))
          AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR failed.repository_name IN ($repository_name))
          AND (COALESCE($build_types) IS NULL OR (failed.is_feature_branch_build AND 'Feature branch' IN ($build_types)) OR (failed.is_integration_build AND 'Integration' IN ($build_types)) OR (failed.is_deployment_build AND 'Deployment' IN ($build_types)))
          AND NOT failed.build_is_succeeded
        GROUP BY failed.project_key, failed.repository_name, failed.repository_group, failed.branch_name, failed_build_number, failed_at
        ORDER BY failed_at) AS failures_history
GROUP BY project_key, repository_name, repository_group, branch_name, recovered_at
) AS failures_history
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(recovered_at,$group_by, NULL)) as normalized

panels.title: $build_types builds MTTR by $group_by (the less - the better)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  CONCAT(project_key, ' ', repository_name, ' (', branch_name, ')') AS "project",
  build_result AS "result",
  CASE 
    WHEN is_deployment_build THEN 'Deployment'
    WHEN is_integration_build THEN 'Integration'
    WHEN is_lead_time_calculation_build THEN 'Lead Time calculation'
    WHEN is_feature_branch_build THEN 'Feature branch'
    ELSE '-' 
  END AS "build type",
  completed_at AS "completed at",
  build_run_id AS "link"
FROM build_run
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(triggered_at) 
  AND (COALESCE($project) IS NULL OR project_key IN ($project))
  AND (COALESCE($repository_group) IS NULL OR repository_group IN ($repository_group))
  AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR repository_name IN ($repository_name))
  AND (COALESCE($build_types) IS NULL OR (is_feature_branch_build AND 'Feature branch' IN ($build_types)) OR (is_integration_build AND 'Integration' IN ($build_types)) OR (is_deployment_build AND 'Deployment' IN ($build_types)))
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(triggered_at, $group_by, 0)

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(triggered_at, $group_by),
  AVG(total_duration_in_seconds) AS "Avg duration",
  AVG(AVG(total_duration_in_seconds)) OVER (ROWS 3 PRECEDING) AS "Avg Duration Trend"
FROM build_run
WHERE build_is_succeeded
  AND (COALESCE($project) IS NULL OR project_key IN ($project))
  AND (COALESCE($repository_group) IS NULL OR repository_group IN ($repository_group))
  AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR repository_name IN ($repository_name))
  AND (COALESCE($build_types) IS NULL OR (is_feature_branch_build AND 'Feature branch' IN ($build_types)) OR (is_integration_build AND 'Integration' IN ($build_types)) OR (is_deployment_build AND 'Deployment' IN ($build_types)))
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(triggered_at, $group_by, NULL)

SELECT
    test_name AS "Test name",
    COUNT(*) AS "Total runs count",
    COUNT(CASE WHEN test_status IN ('FAILED', 'REGRESSION') THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS "Failures count",
    STRING_AGG(DISTINCT CASE WHEN test_status IN ('FAILED', 'REGRESSION') THEN build_run.build_run_id ELSE '' END, '\n') AS "Failed in builds",
    AVG(test_duration) AS "AVG duration"
FROM build_run
INNER JOIN build_run_test ON build_run.build_run_id = build_run_test.build_run_id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(triggered_at)
  AND build_run_test.exclude_from_stats=False
  AND (COALESCE($project) IS NULL OR project_key IN ($project))
  AND (COALESCE($repository_group) IS NULL OR repository_group IN ($repository_group))
  AND (COALESCE($repository_name) IS NULL OR repository_name IN ($repository_name))
  AND (COALESCE($build_types) IS NULL OR (is_feature_branch_build AND 'Feature branch' IN ($build_types)) OR (is_integration_build AND 'Integration' IN ($build_types)) OR (is_deployment_build AND 'Deployment' IN ($build_types)))
GROUP BY build_run_test.test_name
ORDER BY "Failures count" DESC

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT (repository_group) 
FROM build_run 
WHERE COALESCE($project) IS NULL OR project_key IN ($project)
list.label: Repository group
list.name: repository_group
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT (repository_group) 
FROM build_run 
WHERE COALESCE($project) IS NULL OR project_key IN ($project)

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT (repository_name) 
FROM build_run 
WHERE 
(COALESCE($project) IS NULL OR project_key IN ($project)) 
AND (COALESCE($repository_group) IS NULL OR repository_group IN ($repository_group))
list.label: Repository name
list.name: repository_name
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT (repository_name) 
FROM build_run 
WHERE 
(COALESCE($project) IS NULL OR project_key IN ($project)) 
AND (COALESCE($repository_group) IS NULL OR repository_group IN ($repository_group))
